1223220.name: Ragamuffins: Feline Fencers
1223220.description:
Welcome to Ragamuffins!

Nestled in the sleepy village of Felinsha, just between the candle-maker and the man who shouts at bread, sits a little shop called Ragamuffins.

Itâ€™s run by Mr Tibbs, a well-dressed tom with too much confidence and not enough scruples. The sort of cat whoâ€™ll sell you a â€œrare imported spoonâ€ while quietly wondering if itâ€™s still warm from someone elseâ€™s kitchen.

By day, heâ€™s the picture of respectability â€” sweeping the floor, weighing fish, and telling anyone whoâ€™ll listen that heâ€™s definitely retired from that sort of thing. By night, he sends his tiny gang of kittens out into the cobbled streets, armed with claws, cunning, and a few suspiciously shiny playing cards.

Because in Felinsha, cards arenâ€™t just for games â€” theyâ€™re for getting away with things.

Each job, each deal, each scuffle in a moonlit alley plays out like a hand of fate. Youâ€™ll draw your cards, play your tricks, and hope Lady Luck hasnâ€™t already spent the evening with the constable.

Of course, Tibbs insists heâ€™s an honest businessman now. He says he only cheats when absolutely necessary â€” which, in Felinsha, is most of the time.

But the past has long claws. And every deal, every theft, every flick of a card seems to draw something darker a little closerâ€¦

âœ¨ Key Features

  • ğŸ›’ Run the Shop

    Buy, sell, and barter with Felinshaâ€™s finest â€” the butcher, the baker, the chronic liar. Keep your shelves stocked, your kittens fed, and your stories just believable enough that no one calls the guard.

  • ğŸŒ™ Steal by Moonlight

    When the shutters close, the real work begins. Send your kittens to collect goods from the good people of Felinsha. Avoid guards, rival gangs, and nosey neighbours with more curiosity than sense.

  • â™ ï¸ Play Your Cards Right

    Every heist and hustle runs on your hand. Build and play your deck of actions, tricks, and evasions â€” a few slaps, a dash of stealth, a sprinkle of pure nonsense â€” and hope the drawâ€™s in your favour.

  • âš”ï¸ Risk, Reward, Regret

    Youâ€™ve only got so much room in those little paws â€” take too much loot and youâ€™ll have no space left for anything else. Take too few weapons and, wellâ€¦ letâ€™s just say someone will be doing the looting for you. Every decisionâ€™s a gamble â€” and Tibbs has never met a gamble he didnâ€™t like.

  • ğŸ¾ A World of Whiskers and Whispers

    Felinsha looks charming from the outside â€” the marketâ€™s lively, the fish are fresh, and the crime rate is mostly adorable. But dig deeper and youâ€™ll find corruption, old enemies, and maybe a few ghosts from Tibbsâ€™ less-than-honest youth.

  • ğŸ© Charming. Cunning. Catastrophic.

    Play as Mr Tibbs â€” merchant, rogue, card-sharp, and self-proclaimed â€œpillar of the community.â€

Keep the shop running, play your cards right, and try to stay one paw ahead of your past.

Because in Felinsha, everyoneâ€™s bluffing â€” and the house always wins. ğŸ¾
